1042450.name: Deep Space Waifu: World - Soundtrack
1042450.description:
EEP SPACE WAIFU - FANTASY SOUNDTRACK



Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 01 Something's Broken
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 02 Celluloid
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 03 Yiwu
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 04 Too Many Dreams in One Kid
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 05 Something is Broken MENU
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 06 Something is Broken STAGE1
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 07 Yiwu STAGE2
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 08 Yiwu STAGE3
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 09 Too Many Dreams in One Kid STAGE4
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 10 Too Many Dreams in One Kid STAGE5
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 11 Celuloid BOSS
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 12 Celuloid FINAL BOSS
Funny Death - Deep Space Waifu World - 13 Fugue (Dialog)

Every track is .mp3 and it is located in the game's install folder.
